description.en: Grab a wheel and position it at the star line on your challenge field. Get your robot push it as far as it can.
Do not help with your bare hands, let your robot do the job. The farther the wheel run, the better.

You managed to push the wheel till the other edge of the field = Wow! Excellent job! Do you think you can do it even farther?
The wheel ran over the edge of the field = Outstanding! You are such a pro! Well done!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programing your robot?

Let's count your points.
Your robot reached the middle of the challenge field = 5 points
Your robot ran over the middle of the field but stayed within it = 10 points
It ran off the field = 15 points
